sentence: Co-host David Beard also recounts how North Carolina's powerful Republican House speaker got screwed by Madison Cawthorn, then tried to screw Cawthorn back, only for them to both get screwed when the courts rejected the GOP's congressional map a second time.
title: Daily Kos Elections Live Digest: 2/24
